posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.89.0-beta.1. If you‚Äôre interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • This update fixes a bug with text formatting while Caps Lock was enabled so it will be easier to make things bold (or italic) WHILE BEING BOLD. Thanks, @DGrothe-PhD!
  • Signal is a 501c3 nonprofit that wouldn‚Äôt be possible without your support, and now you can donate via PayPal in Signal Desktop.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.88.0-beta.1‚Ä¶v7.89.0-beta.1 ¬∑ signalapp/Signal-Desktop ¬∑ GitHub

New Version: 7.89.0-beta.1

32 new commits since 7.88.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.89.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Add extra API key for benchmarks [2]

  • Better grafana env variables for benchmarks [3]

  • Fix go to pinned message ambiguous sql column [4]

  • Update copy highlighting nonprofit status [5]

  • Switch from Tenor to Giphy for GIF search [6]

  • Donation data workflows for PayPal [7]

  • Key Transparency [8]

  • Fix placeholder in Key Transparency string [9]

  • Update strings [10]

  • Update DNS fallback [11]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.63.0 [12]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7693] Make formatting text with keyboard shortcuts irrespective of Caps Lock [13]

  • Fix non-renderable media files losing filename on upload [14]

  • Update to the latest Group and Backups protos [15]

  • Switch provisioning to libsignal [16]

  • A few CSS tweaks and storybook fixes [17]

  • Update sidebar layout visibility in group calls [18]

  • Add support for PayPal donations [19]

  • Update PayPal cancel handling [20]

  • Update group info permissions string [21]

  • Follow up Key Transparency changes [22]

  • Update release note fetcher to delete unknown saved megaphones [23]

  • Fix donation receipt sorting to show most recent year first [24]

  • Emoji reply in 1:1 conversation should not discard reply text [25]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.64.1 [26]

  • storageRecordOps.toRecipient: Allow for missing recipients [27]

  • Add feature flag for remote megaphone [28]

  • Fix sticker message metadata color in dark mode [29]

  • Release notes for 7.89 [30]

  • Update strings [31]

  • 7.89.0-beta.1 [32]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.88.0-beta.1‚Ä¶v7.89.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn‚Äôt).
